ygData.subject: Re: Hello! and Looking for advice on Mask of Deception
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I played around with sneak in Sol B for a bit.  It works on everything I ran across in there.  If you can t get an Invis to undead, I d suggest staying in
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 18 Feb 2000, Blitz Krieg wrote:
>
> Get Invis to Undead. If you have a friend that can cast Invis to Undead and
> doesn't mind blowing a few hours you're much better off. Most people are

I played around with sneak in Sol B for a bit. It works on
everything I ran across in there. If you can't get an Invis
to undead, I'd suggest staying in sneak mode whenever
possible. It won't guarantee you won't get attacked, but
it'll reduce the likelihood of it happening.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
